channel.title: Scratch server (started from nothing)
channel.description:
its a scratch server [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/8f6aca5ac9.png[/img]
features: [CODE] [B]frames nown as packets[/B] [B]region loading[/B] [B]login[/B] [B]timing[/B] [/CODE]
its not packaged the files are [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/8991de242a.png[/img]
i didnt do most of the work so only 2% creds for me
its really basic created by me iampeter kit and 64base you have todo the rest by yourself all you have todo is add packetreading rendering npcs and some packets then you'll have a good and stable clean server creds are on readme file
the only big is that it dcs in 15 seconds u have to read the incoming packets and itll stop dcing
Download link is here http://uppit.com/TRCVDR[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 20, 2009, 10:56:54 pm[/size][hr]btw login is not client.java
IMPORTANT!!!!! login.java ONLY handles logging in for players so if u need to put vars u put it in player.java ther is and never will be a file called client.java remember that login.java is ONLY used for logging in
